message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair!
I'll take 60, you can have 40. It's a generous offer!
I'm willing to compromise, but I think 55/45 is a fairer split. What do you say?
I'm not budging, I want the majority. You can have 30, but I get 70.
Okay, Bob, I'm willing to give you 60.  Let's call it a day.
